index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to housing; authorizing agreements for and acceptance of financial assistance from the United States, Department of Housing and Urban Development for the 1984 and 1985 Rental Rehabilitation Programs; authorizing implementation of rental housing rehabilitation projects by the Department of Community Development; making an appropriation from the Housing and Community Development Revenue Sharing Fund therefor and establishing a repayment account in said fund; and authorizing the Mayor or his designee to enter into any necessary implementing agreements.
